page.title: 20POTASH FARM,PATTISWICK
page.content: {*}Potash Farm is 338 acres of Grade 2 land of medium quality.It is the smallest of 5 farms in Pattiswick. The tenant farmer employs one other worker;together they do all the work including all of the harvesting.Wheat is the most important crop(400 tons each year),but barley,grass seed,oil-seed rape and peas are also grown. {*}The farmer has the following machinery:4 tractors,a digger,culti- vating implements,a combine harvester, a drill,a grain dryer,storage for 700 tons of grain,hedge-cutting equipment and a fertilizer spreader. {*}Each year he uses 50 tons of nitrogen and 20 tons of phosphate and potash.He also uses approximately 1000 litres of the following chemicals combined:weed control-Dichrane,Hytane and CMPP;fungicide-Bayistin and Tilt.
